summary: Roggi Knot-Beard, the follower of Kynesgrove is essential
descriptionHtml:
Have you recently met Roggi in Kynesgrove and thought " Hey? He looks like a good follower.. Maybe we can go to long adventures once I get his ancestral shield for him" And then get bummed out when he dies to half-a-dozen bandits attacking you on the road? Well, worry no more!

This mod makes Roggi essential so that he won't die (from anything.. not even you!)
It Requires Skyrim's latest update Thank you :)
author: DrWolff
